title: Bug 49536 - Accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps deployed
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server responds with an HTTP code 200 OK, but no content is returned.
EB: When no webapps are deployed on a Tomcat 7 instance and a URL is accessed, the server should respond with an HTTP error code 404 and an appropriate error message.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip.
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
3. Access a URL on the server.
